On today's episode, Dan tells Jordan all about what happened when Alex Jones got really drunk on episode #911 of the [[Joe Rogan Experience]].  Topics covered include:

* Does Alex have excuses for his Y2K episode that actually makes his actions worse?
* Does Alex believe what he believes the elites secretly believe?
* When discussing Paragraph B, does Paragraph C matter?
* Who, other than your least favorite uncle, calls whiskey "apple juice?"
* How much Isaac Asimov has Alex read?

==Tidbits==

* Alex gets drunk and high on Joe Rogan, but denies it
* ICBM reminds Dan of an icy bowel movement
* Dan debunks chemtrails
